TopicTitle: [1.0.x] Procedural Parts Textures | Procedural KW - June 8

Articles.Content:
Heres those pics blackheart.

vs the other side..

On the ground in sunlight had a strange effect I just noticed as well.

Im also having a strage effect with the one Titan fairing. Thing has a.. mind of its own lol.

Other textures seem okay, but some of the orange ones have a glossy effect ( looks like pearlescent paint.. kinda cool actually )
Hmmm, I'll look into the texture. The fairing shapes are due to the lack of procedural customization A little bit of adjusting to get your desired shape is need.
Just curious, were you using Active texture management? Because my textures aren't good with them
I am using the texture management, but I do not have a config setup for your folder so it shouldn't be touching them.
Hmmm, but you have it on stretchy tanks? I'm just curious, mine doesn't look like this.
No config for StretchySRB either. I did have that SweetFX installed at one point, but ive since gotten rid of that. .. Couldn't have helped. I will try a reinstall.
ok, let's paint it for Saturn
You wouldn't be planning on doing some KW style procedural tank textures, would you? Because if you were I'd be eternally grateful.
I cant make the srb nozzles show up at all, i think the download might be bugged.

I cant make the srb nozzles show up at all, i think the download might be bugged.

You wouldn't be planning on doing some KW style procedural tank textures, would you? Because if you were I'd be eternally grateful.

Well, I'll surely do that whenever I find the time

Yeah, they show up white and without any changes to the models, how do i get the skirt over the nozzle like in the pic?

Also, the kw tank textures look awesome! Can you also make some checkered ones like the really early kw tanks?

Ideas. I like them but also loads me up. I can't make all of them quickly so please be patient

What's wrong? Did you copy GameData to the root folder?

There is no gamedata in the dropbox download, just a .rar file:rolleyes:
